turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey can you order a coffee from Peet's for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes. What location should I order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Peet's at 853 Broadway Street in New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order and iced vanilla latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nonfat milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want to add any thing else your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes can I add whipped cream to that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes you can.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK that's all I wanted to order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I am sending that order in now for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your coffee order was sent and will be ready for pick up shortly at the Peet's at 853 Broadway Street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome. The reciept will be sent to your phone shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I just recieved it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are very welcome.
